word: "NOTHING IN THIS WORLD IS SO DEAR TO GOD AS HIS CHURCH. WITH JEALOUS CARE HE GUARDS THOSE WHO SEEK HIM. NOTHING SO OFFENDS GOD AS FOR THE SERVANTS OF SATAN TO STRIVE TO ROB HIS PEOPLE OF THEIR RIGHTS. THE LORD HAS NOT FORSAKEN HIS PEOPLE."--LETTER 136, 1910 (NOV. 26, 1910). PUBLISHED IN SELECTED MESSAGES, B. 2, P. 397.
